promoteToPlayer.description: Promoted player will be available in stopwatch.

bibNumber.label: Bib number
bibNumber.description: Unique bib number is necessary to measure the time for the player. Timing system is based upon it.

classification.label: Classification
classification.description: Each player must be assigned to a classification.

startTime.label: Start time
startTime.description: The player's start time. It is displayed on the start list. It can be used in the timing system to automatically start timing.

promoteToPlayer.title: Promote to Player

bibNumber.label: Bib Number
bibNumber.description: Unique bib number is necessary to measure the time for the player. Timing system is based upon it.

classification.label: Classification
classification.description: Each player must be assigned to a classification.

startTime.label: Start Time
startTime.description: The player's start time. It is displayed on the start list. It can be used in the timing system to automatically start timing.

header.description: Players available in the stopwatch, their times may be measured.
header.title: Players

confirmation.text: You are trying to delete the Race {raceName}. Do you want to proceed?
confirmation.title: Delete race

date.label: Date
date.description: The date of the race displayed in many places and used in the timing system, such as for counting down the time until the start of each player.

description.label: Description
description.description: Description displayed on the race page.

emailTemplate.label: Email template
emailTemplate.placeholder: Enter your appendinx to the registration confirmation email
emailTemplate.description: Text attached at the end of the email with a summary of the competition registration. You can write in it, for example, a thank you for registering and instructions for paying the entry fee.

location.label: Location
location.description: The place where the competition is held. This can be the name of the town, the name of the starting base. Make it easy for competitors to determine where your race will be held. E.g. OSiR Kolna indoor swimming pool.

name.label: Name
name.description: With the full name of the race displayed in many different places, you can distinguish your race from others.

playersLimit.label: Players limit
playersLimit.description: Optional limit on the number of players who can register. When the limit of players is reached, registration will automatically be blocked with an appropriate message.

registrationCutoff.label: Registration cutoff
registrationCutoff.description: Optional date of shutdown of the registration system. After this date, registration of new players will be blocked. Users will see a corresponding message.

registrationEnabled.label: Registration enabled
registrationEnabled.description: You can manually define whether the registration system should be disabled. Optional rules for automatically disabling registration take priority over this setting.

sportKind.label: Sport kind
sportKind.description: The type of competition used for statistical purposes. Makes it easier for people interested in your chosen sport to find your race.

terms.label: Terms and conditions
terms.placeholder: Url to the terms and conditions
terms.description: Url to the document containing the regulations. It will be available for download on the competition registration page, for example.

useSampleData.label: Add sample data
useSampleData.description: Create sample data including: athletes, measuring points, classifications, age categories, starting numbers and measured split times.

websiteUrl.label: Official website
websiteUrl.description: Your race website address, displayed on the race page.

header.description: Manage all past and future races.
header.title: Races ({number})

header.description: Races that will happen soon.
header.title: Upcoming Races

confirmation.text: You are trying to wipe the Race {raceName}. Do you want to proceed?
confirmation.title: Wipe race data

turnOffPopup.description: Online registration will be turned off.
turnOffPopup.title: Turn off registration

turnOnPopup.description: Online registration will be turned on.
turnOnPopup.title: Turn on registration

reason.label: Reason
reason.description: The reason for the penalty, you can refer to the points of the regulations, the reason for the penalty will be displayed in the list of results.

time.label: Time
time.description: The number of seconds that will be added to the player's score.

reason.label: Reason
reason.description: Reason for disqualification, you can refer to the points of the regulations. The reason for disqualification will be displayed in the list of results.

confirmation.title: Apply time penalty

applyTimePenalty.description: Penalty will be added to player's result.
applyTimePenalty.title: Apply time penalty

confirmation.text: You are trying to disqualify the player {name} {lastName}. Do you want to continue?  You can revoke the disqualification at any time.
confirmation.title: Disqualify player

confirmation.title: Revert time penalty

revertTimePenalty.description: The result achieved by the player will be restored.
revertTimePenalty.title: Revert time penalty

confirmation.text: You are trying to revert disqualification of the Player {name} {lastName}. Do you want to proceed?"
confirmation.title: Revert disqualification

revertDisqualification.description: The original score of the player will be restored.
revertDisqualification.title: Revert disqualification

confirmation.text: You are trying to delete the ApiKey {name}. Do you want to proceed?
confirmation.title: Delete ApiKey

name.label: API Key Name
name.description: The name for the API key, allows you to distinguish the different keys from each other.

header.description: API Keys may be configured here.
header.title: Settings

bibNumber.label: Bib number
bibNumber.description: The bib number for which the split time was recorded.

time.label: Time
time.description: The exact time of the player's appearance at the timing point. There will be no information on the results page that the split time has been modified.

timingPoint.label: Timing Point
timingPoint.description: Timing point related to the split time.

header.description: Times measured by the stopwatches.
header.title: Split times

confirmation.text: You are trying to revert manual split time changes. Do you want to proceed?
confirmation.title: Revert manual split time

header.description: Manage the timing point.
header.title: Timing Point

copy.description: Send that to the timekeeper to handle that timing point measurements.
copy.title: Copy access url

confirmation.text: You are trying to delete the Timing Point Access URL {name}. Do you want to proceed?
confirmation.title: Delete timing point access url

delete.description: Stopwatch access using this aceess url won't be possible.
delete.title: Delete access url

edit.description: Change timing point access url details.
edit.title: Edit access url

canAccessOthers.label: Can access others
canAccessOthers.description: Decide whether the timekeeper using this url can switch between timing points, measure the time at different locations. For example, between the start and finish.

code.label: Code (optional)
code.description: Optional code/password to enter when logging into the stopwatch.

name.label: Access Url name
name.description: Use a name that will allow you to distinguish this URL from others, it can be, for example, the name of the timekeeper.

header.description: Copy access URLs and send them to the timekeepers.
header.title: Access URLs

confirmation.text: You are trying to delete the Timing Point {name}. Do you want to proceed?
confirmation.title: Delete timing point

description.label: Description
description.description: Optional description of the timing point displayed in several places in the application.

laps.label: Number of laps
laps.description: Optional number of laps that can be measured at the timing point. Use only in races whose route includes laps.

name.label: Timing Point Name
name.description: The name of the timing point displayed in the stopwatch, times list and result list, such as start, finish, checkpoint.

shortName.label: Short name
shortName.description: The abbreviated name of the timing point, used where the full name cannot fit, is best limited to 2-3 characters.

header.description: Configure points where time will be measured, used in stopwatch.
header.title: Timing points

clock.description: A clock showing the current time synchronized with the timekeeping system clock. Useful to display at the finish and start.
clock.title: Clock

countdown.description: Useful at the launch site. Can be displayed on a phone, tablet or any larger screen. Displays the start number and the name of the next competitor. Counts down the number of seconds until his start. It also allows you to trigger a sound signal.
countdown.title: Countdown (to zero)

preciseClock.description: A clock showing the current time synchronized with the timekeeping system clock. Useful to display at the finish and start. Displays the current time with higher accuracy.
preciseClock.title: Precise Clock

results.description: Displays live results. The results of the athletes appear as soon as you uncheck them in the stopwatch. A breakdown by category is included. The site is adapted for display on a phone, refreshes automatically.
results.title: Live Results

startList.description: The app is useful for all athletes. They can check their starting time. See who has already started, who will start next and how many competitors are left. The entire start list is included. Optimized for mobile phones.
startList.title: Start list

header.description: Tools useful during the race.
header.title: Tools

errors.playerWithoutStartTimeExists: There is a player without the start time defined.
errors.registrationAlreadyPromoted: Registration is already promoted to player.

errors.registrationDisabled: Registration for this race is disabled.
errors.registrationPromotedToPlayer: Registration is promoted to player. You must delete the Player first.

errors.atLeastOneClassificationRequired: Race must have at least one classification
errors.playersAssignedToClassification: It is not possible to delete a classification when players are assigned to it.

errors.atLeastOneRaceRequired: You must have at least one race

icePhoneNumber.label: ICE phone number (optional)
icePhoneNumber.placeholder: Phone number in case of Emergency

shared.generalError: Oops! Something went wrong on our end. Our team has been notified, and we're working to fix it. Please try again later. If the problem persists, feel free to contact support. We apologize for any inconvenience.

disconnected.description: Wait for the auto-reconnect or restart the app by yourself.

noTimingPoint.description: Stopwatch has to measure the time at a specific timing point. Choose a timing point in the configuration to make the measurements.
noTimingPoint.title: No timing point configuration

selectTimingPoint.description: The selection of a point for which time measurement will be conducted.

errors.atLeastTwoTimingPointsRequired: Race must have at least two timing points defined (start and finish)
errors.lapsAllowedOnlyOnCheckpoint: Laps can be configured only on checkpoints
errors.splitTimesForLapsRegistered: It is not possible to reduce the number of laps to a value lower than the number of laps completed by the competitors.
errors.deleteNotAllowedWithSplitTimesRegistered: It is not possible to delete a timing point when the players' split times have been measured on it. You must first delete the split times

header.description: Deletes the timing point permanently. This cannot be undone.
